Notification: Essential Logistics Weekly Maintenance

Dear Colleagues,

 

To ensure business continuity, we have scheduled essential maintenance to enhance the underlying infrastructure of the database systems for WMS and AIA

Saturday, September 28, 2024, | 10:00 PM â€“ 11:59 PM GST

Please be aware that during this period, access to the Warehouse Application (WMS) and Oracle AIA will be temporarily unavailable.

 

If you require assistance during this time, kindly raise a support ticket via the following  link: https://onereach.chalhoub.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonereach.chalhoub.com%2F&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C75db28900eaf4e99941f08dcdc7db579%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638627680327373628%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=zCgp6TgQ6spFBj58U63jXbMMdVXNxIa8ifCa%2BNmw8wM%3D&reserved=0>
